articles.title: How tariffs could upend the auto industry and add thousands to car prices - The Washington Post
articles.description: From raw metal to engines, components travel all over North America before they’re put into cars. What happens if they’re taxed at every stop?
articles.content:
To understand how President Donald Trumps proposed tariffs on goods from Mexico and Canada could rattle the auto industry and hike car prices, you can follow the journey of just one auto part.

articles.author: Meghan Bartels
articles.title: New NASA Space Telescope Will See the Universe in 102 Colors - Scientific American
articles.description: NASA’s SPHEREx mission will survey the entire sky in 102 different “colors” of light, offering scientists an unprecedented look at the earliest days of the universe and much more
articles.content:
NASA is ready to launch a space telescope to see the universe in a whole new way.
